text: Tuusniemi is a municipality in Finland. More than 2,800 people lived there in August 2013. The municipalities next to it are Heinävesi, Juankoski, Kaavi, Kuopio, Leppävirta and Outokumpu. ==History== Between 1904 and 1975 there was an asbestos mine in Paakkila village. It was closed because workers died earlier than others.http://yle.fi/elavaarkisto/artikkelit/paakkilan_asbestikyla_48764.html#media=48766 Video, finnish ==References== == Other websites == * The official Tuusniemi page Category:Municipalities of North Savo
title: Tuusniemi
